评论详情: Super cute and great selection of earrings!

评论概述: They are different than the other ones
评论详情: I like how they are made and the colours they're different than the other that's why I can sell them

You’d think, being made of wood, these would be heavy; they definitely are not! They are light and flowy. They are made so well and are gorgeous! They are retro and boho! I’m really excited to pair these with some outfits. For the price you get EIGHTEEN earrings!? That’s a steal. Big bang for your buck!!

I love that these are light weight!! Heavy earrings hurt my ears so light weight is my go to. There are so many different styles to choose from and I like the color selection! This is great to expand your current collection or to gift! Each earring set came individually wrapped so you can easily gift it to multiple people if you would like.
